content.title: Solaris
content.description: This is a project I have been wanting to do for a while. I made an [illustration](https://plus.google.com/+LucasvanOsenbruggen/posts/DVXyfR85kPQ) of the solar system some time before and wanted to make something more interactive.

content.title: Profile picture
content.description:
I have seen this style some times with other people on the internet and decided I wanted it too. I started with an image of my face and drew the outlines. Then I filled the shapes with different colors. I used darker shades for depth and added shadows. I first made it in PNG but later converted to SVG.


This image is my personal logo and I use it in a lot of places.

content.title: Picturer
content.description: I wanted to learn to work with canvas and thought it would be fun to make a profile picture creator. The idea came from my [collection](https://plus.google.com/collection/8jO2fB).

content.title: Presentation genes
content.description:
I gave a presentation about the editing of genes. We had an discussion about the topic with the class. 


 I got the idea (and many illustrations) from a [Kurzgesagt video](https://youtu.be/jAhjPd4uNFY).

content.title: Boarding screen
content.description:
This was my concept for a boarding screen for Android. It was my first project with a clear deadline and one where I used HTML for a design instead of an image.


It was part of a design challenge on [MaterialUp](https://www.uplabs.com/challenges/the-materialup-challenge).

content.title: T-Shirt
content.description: I made a t-shirt for a song by _Bo Burnham_. The song is called [#deep](https://youtu.be/RUBjHPYH8Rs). The design was made by myself and ironed onto a shirt. The quality of the shirt itself was not that great but I still rather like the design.

content.title: Portfolio
content.description:
This portfolio you're viewing is a project too. I made this as my final project for the school year using _PHP_. This was my first project where I documented everything and planned ahead.


 I later converted it to _Node.js_ myself when moving from _Github Pages_ to the webhost _Heroku_.


I am still working on it and adding more features./nThe page for entering data can be found [here](/pages/entry). _You need the password for the data to be accepted._

content.title: Vita Simulare
content.description: My biggest project yet. I wanted to create life-like bacteria that evolved before your eyes./n/n/nI was inspired to do this project by [Nature of Code](http://natureofcode.com/book/), Daniel Shiffman.

content.title: Faunadex
content.description: I always wanted to have a Pok√©dex for animals. I finally created it using _[Clarifai](https://www.clarifai.com/)_. It only works on the newest version of Chrome on Android as far As I know.
